mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPARTMENT_NO, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, D.MANAGER, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS employeeName, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO AND RESIGNATION_STATUS = 'N' ) AS employeeCount FROM DEPARTMENT D LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON D.MANAGER = E.EMPLOYEE_NO AND E.RESIGNATION_STATUS = 'N' WHERE D.SUBER_NO = #{suberNo} ORDER BY D.DEPARTMENT_NO
SELECT DEPARTMENT_NO, DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE SUBER_NO = #{suberNo} ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_NO ASC
SELECT RANK_ID, JOB_TITLE_NAME FROM RANK ORDER BY RANK_ID ASC
SELECT RIGHTS_ID, RIGHTS_NAME FROM RIGHTS ORDER BY RIGHTS_ID ASC

SELECT s.COMPANY_NAME, d.DEPARTMENT_NO, d.DEPARTMENT_NAME, d.UPPER_DEP_NO, d.DEPARTMENT_LEVEL, d.SUBER_NO, e.EMPLOYEE_NO, e.EMPLOYEE_NAME, e.RANK_ID, r.JOB_TITLE_NAME, r.JOB_TITLE_LEVEL, e.PHONE_NUMBER, e.PROFILE_IMAGE_BLOB FROM SUBER s JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON s.SUBER_NO = d.SUBER_NO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON d.DEPARTMENT_NO = e.DEPARTMENT_NO AND e.SUBER_NO = d.SUBER_NO AND e.RESIGNATION_STATUS = 'N' LEFT JOIN RANK r ON e.RANK_ID = r.RANK_ID WHERE d.SUBER_NO = #{suberNo} ORDER BY s.COMPANY_NAME, d.DEPARTMENT_LEVEL, d.UPPER_DEP_NO, d.DEPARTMENT_NO, r.JOB_TITLE_LEVEL DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(DEPARTMENT_NO), 0) + 1 FROM DEPARTMENT
INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT ( DEPARTMENT_NO, UPPER_DEP_NO, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_LEVEL, MANAGER, SUBER_NO ) VALUES ( #{departmentNo}, #{upperDepNo}, #{departmentName}, #{departmentLevel}, #{manager}, #{suberNo} )
